Class UserPreferences

java.lang.Object
cat.dam.roig.cleanstream.services.prefs.UserPreferences
public final class UserPreferences extends Object
Centralized manager for persistent user preferences.

This class wraps Preferences to provide a clean and controlled way to store and retrieve application configuration values.

Responsibilities:

  • Persist configuration settings across application restarts
  • Encapsulate preference keys
  • Provide typed getters and setters
  • Convert between PreferencesData and stored values

Design decisions:

  • All methods are static (utility-style access)
  • Keys are centralized as private constants
  • Blank values remove the preference instead of storing empty strings

This class does not perform validation. Validation is handled separately by PreferencesValidator.
